description: Thirty years ago, in the sleepy community of Waterbury, a killer known as “The Executioner” murdered Sarah Bennett's parents. Now Sarah and her husband Dylan have returned to town, only to find herself the centerpiece in a series of horrifying murders centered around the seven deadly sins.

name: The Twilight Zone
actors: Forest Whitaker
description: A 2002 revival of Rod Serling's 1950/60s television series, The Twilight Zone, with actor Forest Whitaker assuming Serling's role as narrator and on-screen host.

name: Forever
actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Judd Hirsch, Alana de la Garza, Lorraine Toussaint, Donnie Keshawarz
description: Doctor Henry Morgan, New York City’s star medical examiner, has a secret. He doesn't just study the dead to solve criminal cases, he does it to solve the mystery that has eluded him for 200 years—the answer to his own inexplicable immortality. This long life has given Henry remarkable observation skills which impresses his new partner, Detective Jo Martinez. Each week, a new case and their budding friendship will reveal layers of Henry’s long and colorful past. Only his best friend and confidant, Abe knows Henry’s secret.

name: Countdown
actors: Jensen Ackles, Jessica Camacho, Eric Dane, Violett Beane, Uli Latukefu
description: When an officer with the Department of Homeland Security is murdered in broad daylight, LAPD detective Mark Meachum is recruited to a secret task force, alongside undercover agents from all branches of law enforcement, to investigate. But the hunt for the killer soon uncovers a plot far more sinister than anyone could have imagined, kicking off a race against time to save a city of millions.

name: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
actors: Casey Kasem, Don Messick, Frank Welker, Heather North, Pat Stevens
description: Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy, and the talking dog, Scooby-Doo, travel on the Mystery Machine van, in search of weird mysteries to solve.

name: Big Mouth
actors: Lee Jong-suk, Yoona, Kim Ju-hun, Kwak Dong-yeon, Yang Kyung-won
description: A lawyer with a ten-percent winning rate is caught up in a murder case and becomes the notorious and genius con artist, Big Mouse, overnight. In order to survive and protect his family, he tries to reveal the true colors of the privileged people involved in a huge conspiracy.

name: Big Sky
actors: Katheryn Winnick, Kylie Bunbury, Dedee Pfeiffer, J. Anthony Pena, Jensen Ackles
description: Private detective Cassie Dewell partners with ex-cop Jenny Hoyt on a search for two sisters who have been kidnapped by a truck driver on a remote highway in Montana. When they discover that these are not the only girls who have disappeared in the area, they must race against the clock to stop the perpetrator before another woman is taken.

name: Shark
actors: James Woods, Jeri Ryan, Danielle Panabaker, Sophina Brown, Sarah Carter
description: Notorious Los Angeles defense attorney Sebastian Stark becomes disillusioned with his career after his successful defense of a wife-abuser results in the wife's death. After more than a month trying to come to grips with his situation, he is invited by the Los Angeles district attorney to become a public prosecutor so he can apply his unorthodox-but-effective talents to putting guilty people away instead of putting them back on the street.

name: The Case Study of Vanitas
actors: Natsuki Hanae, Kaito Ishikawa, Inori Minase, Shino Shimoji, Ai Kayano
description: In 19th-century Paris, young vampire Noé finds the Book of Vanitas in human hands. Calling himself Vanitas, this doctor wields its power and tempts Noé with a plan to “cure” all vampires. Allying with him may be dangerous, but does he have a choice?

name: LINK CLICK
actors: Su Shangqing, Yang Tianxiang, Li Shimeng
description: Using superpowers to enter their clientele’s photos one by one, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang take their work seriously at “Time Photo Studio,” a small photography shop set in the backdrop of a modern metropolis. Each job can be full of danger, but nothing is more important than fulfilling every order, no matter the scale…or peril involved!

name: The Thaw
actors: Katarzyna Wajda, Bartłomiej Kotschedoff, Juliusz Chrząstowski, Karol Dziuba, Marta Malikowska
description: Set in Szczecin, Poland, the series begins after the body of a young woman is discovered under the melting ice. It asks ‘Who was she? Why did she die? Who did she leave behind?

name: Ace Attorney
actors: Masashi Tamaki, Yuki Kaji, Aoi Yuuki, Saori Yumiba, Akio Otsuka
description: A rookie lawyer Ryuuichi Naruhodou stands up to save his defendants by proving their innocence from unusual cases! Is the defendant guilty or innocent...? Believing his client's innocence Naruhodou stands in court and battles his rival judges. With the word of "OBJECTION!" and limited evidence, Naruhodou makes a comeback when all odds are against him and seems like there is nothing more he can do. Don't miss out on the comical episodes between him and his mentor Chihiro Ayasato, assistant Mayoi Ayasato, rival prosecutor Reiji Mitsurugi, and numerous unique characters! The anime also depicts the childhood relationship between Naruhodou and his friends. With the skills inherited from his mentor Naruho reveals the truth!

name: Dark Winds
actors: Zahn McClarnon, Kiowa Gordon, Jessica Matten, Deanna Allison
description: This psychological thriller follows two Navajo police officers, Leaphorn and Chee, in the 1970s Southwest as their search for clues in a grisly double murder case forces them to challenge their own spiritual beliefs and come to terms with the trauma of their pasts.

name: Inspector Morse
actors: John Thaw, Kevin Whately, Peter Woodthorpe, James Grout
description: Inspector Morse is a detective drama based on Colin Dexter's series of Chief Inspector Morse novels. The series starred John Thaw as Chief Inspector Morse and Kevin Whately as Sergeant Lewis, as well as a large cast of notable actors and actresses.

name: Fairy Tail
genres: Animation, Action & Adventure, Comedy, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
actors: Tetsuya Kakihara, Aya Hirano, Rie Kugimiya, Yuichi Nakamura, Sayaka Ohara
description: Lucy is a 17-year-old girl, who wants to be a full-fledged mage. One day when visiting Harujion Town, she meets Natsu, a young man who gets sick easily by any type of transportation. But Natsu isn't just any ordinary kid, he's a member of one of the world's most infamous mage guilds: Fairy Tail.

name: Baretta
actors: Robert Blake, Dana Elcar, Sharon Cintron, Burt Young
description: Baretta is an American detective television series which ran on ABC from 1975 to 1978. The show was a milder version of a successful 1973–74 ABC series, Toma, starring Tony Musante as chameleon-like, real-life New Jersey police officer David Toma. While popular, Toma received intense criticism at the time for its realistic and frequent depiction of police and criminal violence. When Musante left the series after a single season, the concept was retooled as Baretta, with Robert Blake in the title role.

name: My Name
actors: Han So-hee, Park Hee-soon, Ahn Bo-hyun, Kim Sang-ho, Lee Hak-ju
description: Following her father's murder, a revenge-driven woman puts her trust in a powerful crime boss — and enters the police force under his direction.

name: Kakegurui
actors: Tatsuya Tokutake, Saori Hayami, Minami Tanaka, Ayaka Fukuhara, Karin Nanami
description: Hyakkaou Private Academy. An institution for the privileged with a very peculiar curriculum. You see, when you're the sons and daughters of the wealthiest of the wealthy, it's not athletic prowess or book smarts that keep you ahead. It's reading your opponent, the art of the deal. What better way to hone those skills than with a rigorous curriculum of gambling? At Hyakkaou Private Academy, the winners live like kings, and the losers are put through the wringer. But when Yumeko Jabami enrolls, she's gonna teach these kids what a high roller really looks like!

name: Broadchurch
actors: David Tennant, Olivia Colman, Julie Hesmondhalgh, Mark Bazeley, Lenny Henry
description: The murder of a young boy in a small coastal town brings a media frenzy, which threatens to tear the community apart.

name: .hack
actors: Takahiro Sakurai, Megumi Toyoguchi, Junpei Takiguchi, Takumi Yamazaki, Sanae Kobayashi
description: .hack follows several young players as they navigate the vast, mysterious MMORPG known as “The World” – a place, it turns out, that is sometimes impossible to leave.

name: Night Gallery
actors: Rod Serling
description: Rod Serling narrates an anthology of fantasy, horror and sci-fi stories from a set resembling a macabre museum. A chilling work of art serves as the connective link between the stories.

name: Shadows House
actors: Akari Kito, Yu Sasahara, Koudai Sakai, Ayane Sakura, Reiji Kawashima
description: A faceless clan lives in a large mansion, masquerading as nobles. Their caretakers are living dolls who spend their days cleaning up the dirt the tenants leave behind. But there’s a deeper mystery at play… and the secret of the house will be unveiled.

name: Higurashi: When They Cry - NEW
actors: Soichiro Hoshi, Mai Nakahara, Satsuki Yukino, Mika Kanai, Yukari Tamura
description: New kid Keiichi Maebara is settling into his new home of peaceful Hinamizawa village. Making quick friends with the girls from his school, he's arrived in time for the big festival of the year. But something about this isolated town seems "off," and his feelings of dread continue to grow. With a gnawing fear that he's right, what dark secrets could this small community be hiding?

name: Ultraman
actors: Susumu Kurobe, Akiji Kobayashi, Sandayuu Dokumamushi, Hiroko Sakurai, Masaya Nihei
description: Hayata is a member of the Science Patrol, an organization tasked with investigating bizarre anomalies. He is mortally wounded when accidently encountering an alien being from Land of Light, who grants Hayata new life as the two are merged into one. Now, whenever a threat arises that is too great for the Science Patrol to handle, Hayata activates the beta capsule and becomes the hero known as Ultraman.

name: The Files of the Young Kindaichi
actors: Shunsuke Michieda, Moka Kamishiraishi, Ikki Sawamura, Iwasaki Taisho
description: A young man who showed little promise while a high school student becomes a master detective, just like his grandfather.

name: 77 Sunset Strip
actors: Efrem Zimbalist Jr., Edd Byrnes, Roger Smith, Jacqueline Beer, Louis Quinn
description: Stu Bailey and Jeff Spencer are the wisecracking, womanizing private-detective heroes of this Warner Brothers drama. They work out of an office located at 77 Sunset Strip in Los Angeles, California, right next door to a snazzy restaurant where Kookie works as a valet. The finger-snapping, slang-talking Kookie occasionally helps Stu and Jeff with their cases, and eventually becomes a full-fledged member of the detective agency. Rex Randolph and J.R. Hale also join the firm, and Suzanne is their leggy secretary.

name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
actors: Neil Patrick Harris, Patrick Warburton, Malina Weissman, Louis Hynes, K. Todd Freeman
description: The orphaned Baudelaire children face trials, tribulations and the evil Count Olaf, all in their quest to uncover the secret of their parents' death.

name: Prodigal Son
actors: Tom Payne, Michael Sheen, Bellamy Young, Lou Diamond Phillips, Halston Sage
description: The son of a notorious serial killer becomes an acclaimed criminal psychologist who uses his unique insight into how killers think to help the NYPD.

name: Red Eagle
director: Daniel Écija, Juan Carlos Cueto, Pilar Nadal
actors: David Janer, Inma Cuesta, Pepa Aniorte, Guillermo Campra, Patrick Criado
description: Red Eagle is a series of adventure and intrigue on the courage, nobility, friendship and love. The protagonist is an unsung hero of justice of the seventeenth century, known by the nickname of Red Eagle, who helps the weak and who is determined to uncover the conspiracy behind the murder of his young wife.

name: Darker than Black
genres: Animation, Action & Adventure, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Mystery
actors: Hidenobu Kiuchi, Kiyomi Asai, Ikuya Sawaki, Kana Hanazawa
description: Ten years ago, a mysterious spatial anomaly now known as "Heaven's Gate" appeared in South America, shortly followed by the opening of "Hell's Gate" in Tokyo altering the sky and wreaking havoc on the landscape. The real stars disappeared, replaced by false stars. During this time, people possessing various special abilities — called "Contractors" — emerged, each capable of different supernatural feats. Following the disastrous Heaven's War, the United States lost its dominant position as a superpower to a mysterious organization named the Syndicate. The story revolves around a Chinese contractor codenamed "Hei" as he undertakes various espionage and assassination missions in Tokyo.

name: Streets of Broken Lights
actors: Aleksandr Polovtsev, Oleg Andreev, Mikhail Luchko, Aleksandr Nesterov, Elena Kuprashevich
description: Russian detectives unwind the ball of the most intricate and cruel crimes. They are consummate professionals, the best cops in town. Even on the most dangerous missions, this quartet never loses their sense of humor. It is it that helps them find the most incredible ways out of any situation. They uphold the law and emerge victorious.

name: Darker than Black
genres: Animation, Action & Adventure, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Mystery
actors: Hidenobu Kiuchi, Kiyomi Asai, Ikuya Sawaki, Kana Hanazawa
description: Ten years ago, a mysterious spatial anomaly now known as "Heaven's Gate" appeared in South America, shortly followed by the opening of "Hell's Gate" in Tokyo altering the sky and wreaking havoc on the landscape. The real stars disappeared, replaced by false stars. During this time, people possessing various special abilities — called "Contractors" — emerged, each capable of different supernatural feats. Following the disastrous Heaven's War, the United States lost its dominant position as a superpower to a mysterious organization named the Syndicate. The story revolves around a Chinese contractor codenamed "Hei" as he undertakes various espionage and assassination missions in Tokyo.

name: Brazil Avenue
actors: Débora Falabella, Adriana Esteves, Murilo Benício, Cauã Reymond, Marcello Novaes
description: Brazil Avenue is a dynamic, lifelike, and modern telenovela that reveals how unrelenting ambition and inflicted cruelty can change a young girl’s destiny and lead her to seek revenge.

name: The Judge from Hell
actors: Park Shin-hye, Kim Jae-young, Kim Ah-young, Kim In-kwon, Kim Hye-hwa
description: A cruel and vicious judge, who wields power only for herself, meets a warm and cheerful detective who puts the victims first.

name: Hemlock Grove
actors: Landon Liboiron, Bill Skarsgård, Famke Janssen, Madeleine Martin, Camille De Pazzis
description: One cannot quench his all-consuming thirst. The other cannot tame the beast clawing its way out. In the sleepy Pennsylvania village of Hemlock Grove, two young men struggle to accept painful truths: about family, themselves, the mystery of the White Tower - and a terrifying new threat so powerful it will turn them from predators into prey.

name: Moriarty the Patriot
actors: Soma Saito, Takuya Sato, Chiaki Kobayashi, Makoto Furukawa, Yuki Ono
description: In the late 19th century, the British Empire nobility reigns while its working class suffers at their hands. Sympathetic to their plight, William James Moriarty wants to topple it all. Frustrated by the systemic inequity, Moriarty strategizes to fix the entire nation. Not even consulting detective Sherlock Holmes can stand in his way. It’s time for crime to revolutionize the world!

name: Lynley
actors: Leo Suter, Sofia Barclay, Daniel Mays, Niamh Walsh, Michael Workéyè
description: Tommy Lynley is a brilliant police detective but an outsider in the force – simply by virtue of his aristocratic upbringing. He is paired with Barbara Havers, a sergeant with a maverick attitude and a working-class background. With seemingly nothing in common and against all odds, the mismatched duo of Lynley and Havers become a formidable team, bonded by their desire to see justice done.

name: Girl from Nowhere
actors: Chicha Amatayakul
description: A mysterious, clever girl named Nanno transfers to different schools, exposing the lies and misdeeds of the students and faculty at every turn.

name: Justice Pao
actors: Jin Chao-Chun, Hung-Hsuan Fan, Nina Paw Hei-Ching, Ng Wai-Kwok, Liu Xiaoqing
description: Justice Bao (新包青天), a 1995–1996 series produced by ATV and starring Jin Chao-chun as Bao Zheng, with 25 cases totaling 160 episodes.

name: Motive
actors: Kristin Lehman, Louis Ferreira, Brendan Penny, Lauren Holly
description: A team of Vancouver investigators, led by homicide detective Angie Flynn, sets out to uncover the motive of each puzzling murder by discovering the killer's connection to the victim. Viewers get a glimpse of the killer before and after the crime is committed.

name: Furuya Ikkou's Great Detective Kindaichi Kousuke Series
actors: Ikko Furuya, Hajime Hana, Takuya Fujioka, Kei Tani, Toshinori Omi

name: The Good Detective
actors: Son Hyun-joo, Jang Seung-jo, Kim Hyo-jin, Jung Moon-sung, Cha Rae-hyung
description: A drama about the race between people who want to get closer to the truth and those who want to cover it up. Jang Seung Jo will take on the role of Oh Ji Hyuk, an elite detective of nine years who does not share his feelings with others due to pain he experienced when he was young. He is not swayed by money and power, even with the huge wealth he inherited from his uncle.

name: Seven Detectives
actors: Noriyuki Higashiyama, Kana Kurashina, Kotaro Yoshida, Kinya Kitaoji
description: Yū Amagi is a slightly eccentric detective who has been assigned to the Twelfth Section of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department's First Investigative Division from the Lost and Found Centre. The Twelfth Section is called the "graveyard of detectives" and ridiculed as the "banishment room where hardened detectives who cannot be fired are sent." Its assembled detectives Kōsuke Samura, Takumi Yamashita, Keita Nagasawa, Tamaki Mizuta, and Masatoshi Katagiri are elite and yet oddballs. Amagi appears fixated with time which seems to have no relation with a case. Raising questions about the timelines of the perpetrator and victim derived from the estimated time of death, time of crime, time of alibi, and time limit, he searches for the meaning of "blank time" which arises from this. He obsesses over the weight of every minute and second of time because of some incident.

name: The Promised Neverland
genres: Animation, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure, Drama, Crime
actors: Sumire Morohoshi, Mariya Ise, Shinei Ueki, Erisa Kuon, Lynn
description: Emma, Norman and Ray are the brightest kids at the Grace Field House orphanage. And under the care of the woman they refer to as “Mom,” all the kids have enjoyed a comfortable life. Good food, clean clothes and the perfect environment to learn—what more could an orphan ask for? One day, though, Emma and Norman uncover the dark truth of the outside world they are forbidden from seeing.

name: Wie is de Mol?
director: Michiel Devlieger, Tom Lenaerts, Michel Vanhove
actors: Rik van de Westelaken
description: Ten candidates have to complete assignments to earn money. However, one of the group members is the Mole. The Mole's goal is to make the assignments fail and keep the amount of money earned as low as possible. The other candidates do not know who the Mole is and need to unmask them. At the end of every episode, the candidates take a multiple-choice test about the mole's identity. The person who gives the least amount of correct answers is "executed" and must leave. This process continues until only two contestants and the Mole remain. The winner is the person with the most correct answers in the final test and they get all of the money earned in previous stages of the game.

name: Coroner
actors: Serinda Swan, Roger Cross, Ehren Kassam, Kiley May, Andy McQueen
description: Jenny Cooper investigates unexplained or sudden deaths in the city of Toronto. Fierce and quick-witted, Jenny is a newly-widowed single mother with secrets of her own to unearth.

name: Sister Boniface Mysteries
actors: Lorna Watson, Max Brown, Jerry Iwu, Ami Metcalf
description: First there was Father Brown. Now, say hello to Sister Boniface. This clever, moped-riding nun is the police's secret weapon for solving murders in this divine Father Brown spin-off.

name: Beyblade: Metal Saga
genres: Animation, Mystery, Action & Adventure, Kids, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
actors: Nobuhiko Okamoto, Koki Uchiyama, Takuma Terashima, Yuuki Kodaira, Sumire Morohoshi
description: A new cast of characters take on the continued battle between good and evil. Gingka, our hero, and his group of loyal friends take on a dangerous group called the Dark Nebula. Dark Nebula’s mission is to take over the world and unleash their evil upon it; but before they can do so, they must destroy Gingka as he is the only person that’s strong enough to stand in their way. The plot thickens as friends become enemies and enemies become allies. Everything starts and ends with Gingka as he struggles to find the strength to defend his world and the honor of Beyblade.

name: Missing
actors: Caterina Scorsone, Vivica A. Fox, Mark Consuelos
description: Jess Mastriani was a normal person who only wanted to take over her parents' restaurant in Indiana. But that changed when she was hit by lightning. After that she began seeing visions of missing people. Jess decides to use her newfound ability to be a consultant to the FBI, helping locate missing individuals. Eventually, she is hired by the bureau full-time and trained to become an agent, but her by-the-book nature sometimes clashes with the personality of her partner. Jess and her colleagues work out of the FBI's Washington, D.C., office.

name: The Adventures of Tintin
actors: Thierry Wermuth, Christian Pelissier, Henri Labussière, Yves Barsacq, Jean-Pierre Moulin
description: Travel with Tintin, the young and intrepid Belgian reporter, and his faithful dog Snowy as they take you from Tibet to the Moon, or from Egypt to the depths of the sea -- solving mysteries, pursuing truth and justice, and gambling with their lives.

name: Young Justice Bao
actors: Ashton Chen, Deng Chao, Zhao Yang, Qin Li, Yang Rong

name: Dark Gathering
actors: Yu Sasahara, Nobunaga Shimazaki, Kana Hanazawa
description: The story centers on Keitarou Gentouga, who has the ability to be a spirit medium. In junior high school, he got someone else wrapped up in a spirit possession incident, and he has been a shut-in for more than two years. As he reintroduces himself to society as a private tutor, he meets a genius girl named Yayoi Houzuki. Yayoi is instantly able to tell that Keitarou has skill as a spirit medium, and she invites him to go with her to a haunted location. The two then start their journey capturing evil spirits.

name: Vagabond
actors: Lee Seung-gi, Suzy, Shin Sung-rok, Moon Jeong-hee, Baek Yoon-sik
description: Stuntman Cha Dal-geon gets involved in a tragic airplane crash and ends up discovering a national corruption scandal in the process. Go Hae-ri, the oldest daughter of a deceased marine, decides to work for the National Intelligence Service as a secret ops agent in order to support her mom and younger siblings, although all she wanted to do is to become a civil servant.

name: Hellbound
actors: Kim Sung-cheol, Kim Hyun-joo, Kim Shin-rock
description:
Unearthly beings deliver bloody condemnations, sending individuals to hell and giving rise to a religious group founded on the idea of divine justice.

~~ Adapted from the webcomic "Hellbound" (지옥) written by Yeon Sang Ho (연상호) and illustrated by Choi Kyu Seok (최규석).

name: The Good Detective
actors: Son Hyun-joo, Jang Seung-jo, Kim Hyo-jin, Jung Moon-sung, Cha Rae-hyung
description: A drama about the race between people who want to get closer to the truth and those who want to cover it up. Jang Seung Jo will take on the role of Oh Ji Hyuk, an elite detective of nine years who does not share his feelings with others due to pain he experienced when he was young. He is not swayed by money and power, even with the huge wealth he inherited from his uncle.

name: The story of the day when the tail was bitten
actors: Jang Hyun-sung, Jang Do-yeon, Jang Sung-kyu

name: Prodigal Son
actors: Tom Payne, Michael Sheen, Bellamy Young, Lou Diamond Phillips, Halston Sage
description: The son of a notorious serial killer becomes an acclaimed criminal psychologist who uses his unique insight into how killers think to help the NYPD.

name: When the Phone Rings
actors: Yoo Yeon-seok, Chae Soo-bin, Heo Nam-jun, Jang Gyu-ri
description: A rising politician and his mute wife's tense marriage begins to unravel after a call from a kidnapper turns their lives upside down.

name: A Favorita
actors: Patricia Pillar, Cláudia Raia, Murilo Benício, Mariana Ximenes, Cauã Reymond
description: Donatela and Flora, two friends who became rivals. One of them committed a homicide and pretends to be innocent. There are two versions for the same story. Who, after all, is telling the truth? Donatela or Flora?

name: Touch
actors: Kiefer Sutherland, David Mazouz, Saxon Sharbino, Lukas Haas
description: Martin Bohm, a widower and single father, is haunted by an inability to connect to his autistic, mute 11-year-old son, Jake. Their relationship and their lives take an extraordinary turn when he discovers his gifted son has the ability to see things that no one else can and the patterns that connect seemingly unrelated events.

name: Darker than Black
genres: Animation, Action & Adventure, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Mystery
actors: Hidenobu Kiuchi, Kiyomi Asai, Ikuya Sawaki, Kana Hanazawa
description: Ten years ago, a mysterious spatial anomaly now known as "Heaven's Gate" appeared in South America, shortly followed by the opening of "Hell's Gate" in Tokyo altering the sky and wreaking havoc on the landscape. The real stars disappeared, replaced by false stars. During this time, people possessing various special abilities — called "Contractors" — emerged, each capable of different supernatural feats. Following the disastrous Heaven's War, the United States lost its dominant position as a superpower to a mysterious organization named the Syndicate. The story revolves around a Chinese contractor codenamed "Hei" as he undertakes various espionage and assassination missions in Tokyo.

name: The Promised Neverland
genres: Animation, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure, Drama, Crime
actors: Sumire Morohoshi, Mariya Ise, Shinei Ueki, Erisa Kuon, Lynn
description: Emma, Norman and Ray are the brightest kids at the Grace Field House orphanage. And under the care of the woman they refer to as “Mom,” all the kids have enjoyed a comfortable life. Good food, clean clothes and the perfect environment to learn—what more could an orphan ask for? One day, though, Emma and Norman uncover the dark truth of the outside world they are forbidden from seeing.

name: Shark
actors: James Woods, Jeri Ryan, Danielle Panabaker, Sophina Brown, Sarah Carter
description: Notorious Los Angeles defense attorney Sebastian Stark becomes disillusioned with his career after his successful defense of a wife-abuser results in the wife's death. After more than a month trying to come to grips with his situation, he is invited by the Los Angeles district attorney to become a public prosecutor so he can apply his unorthodox-but-effective talents to putting guilty people away instead of putting them back on the street.

name: Scooby-Doo and Scrappy-Doo
director: Joe Ruby, Ken Spears, William Hanna
actors: Casey Kasem, Don Messick
description: Everyone’s favorite mystery-solving Great Dane is here to find clues, along with a little help from his energetic nephew and four human companions.

name: .hack
actors: Takahiro Sakurai, Megumi Toyoguchi, Junpei Takiguchi, Takumi Yamazaki, Sanae Kobayashi
description: .hack follows several young players as they navigate the vast, mysterious MMORPG known as “The World” – a place, it turns out, that is sometimes impossible to leave.

name: The Adventures of Tintin
actors: Thierry Wermuth, Christian Pelissier, Henri Labussière, Yves Barsacq, Jean-Pierre Moulin
description: Travel with Tintin, the young and intrepid Belgian reporter, and his faithful dog Snowy as they take you from Tibet to the Moon, or from Egypt to the depths of the sea -- solving mysteries, pursuing truth and justice, and gambling with their lives.

name: Vampire Expert
actors: Lam Ching-Ying, Kiki Sheung, Frankie Lam, Mang Hoi, Annie Man Chung-Han
description: Zhang Tian-shi's 18th generation disciple, Mao Xiao-fang, heads south to Hong Kong to track down the zombie king. Along the way, he meets Yang Fei-yun, a master of numerology and fortune-telling. Mao gains recognition for his exceptional Taoist abilities, which attracts jealousy from the head of the Seven Sisters Hall, Chung Kwan. Chung is bitter enemies with Mao, but her younger brother Chung Pong, a prodigious student, takes Mao as his teacher. Mao is unaware that Yang is a cunning and treacherous scoundrel. Yang tricks him into a trap, and eventually becomes the Great Demon King. Chung Pong sacrifices his relationship with his lover, Yuh Pak-sum, to become a great Taoist and help Mao defeat Yang.

name: Fangs of Fortune
actors: Hou Minghao, Chen Duling, Tian Jiarui, Cheng Xiao, Lin Ziye
description:
During the Zhenyuan era, the accidental death of the Bai Ze goddess, who governed both human and demon realms, leads to chaos as demon beasts run rampant. Disguised as Zhao Yuanzhou, the demon leader Zhu Yan offers to form a demon-hunting bureau to help restore order.

Wen Xiao, suspicious of Zhao Yuanzhou, joins the bureau along with her childhood friend Zhuo Yichen, skilled archer Pei Sijing, and the talented but timid doctor Bai Jiu. Together, they confront the creatures from "The Classic of Mountains and Seas" and uncover the darker truths behind the chaos.

name: True Haunting
description: Paranormal encounters from the viewpoint of those who lived them are detailed through immersive reenactments and present-day interviews.

name: Umineko: When They Cry
genres: Animation, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Drama, Mystery, Crime
actors: Marina Inoue, Daisuke Ono, Emi Shinohara, Akihiko Ishizumi, Kenichi Suzumura
description:
As customary per year, the entire family is gathering on the island for a conference that discusses the current financial situations of each respective person. Because of the family head's poor health, this year involves the topic of the head of the family's inheritance and how it will be distributed.

However, the family is unaware that the distribution of his wealth is the least of Ushiromiya Kinzo's concerns for this year's family conference. After being told that his end was approaching by his longtime friend and physician, Kinzo is desperate to meet his life's true love one last time: the Golden Witch, Beatrice. Having immersed himself in black magic for many of the later years in his life, Kinzo instigates a ceremony to revive his beloved upon his family's arrival on Rokkenjima.

name: Guillermo del Toro's Cabinet of Curiosities
description: Bizarre nightmares unfold in eight tales of terror in this visually stunning, spine-tingling horror collection curated by Guillermo del Toro.

name: Agatha All Along
actors: Kathryn Hahn, Joe Locke, Sasheer Zamata, Ali Ahn, Debra Jo Rupp
description: Agatha Harkness gathers a coven of witches and sets off down, down, down The Witches' Road.

name: Tengoku Daimakyo
genres: Animation, Mystery, Action & Adventure, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
actors: Gen Sato, Sayaka Senbongi, Hibiku Yamamura, Toshiyuki Toyonaga, Misato Fukuen
description: In the year 2024, the world has collapsed. Grotesque monsters lurk amongst the ruins of Japan, while remaining people scrape together what they can to survive. Kiruko, an odd-job girl in Nakano, accepts a mysterious woman's dying wish to take a boy named Maru to a place called Heaven. Maru is convinced that there will be a boy there who looks exactly like him.

name: UNTAMED
actors: Eric Bana, Sam Neill, Rosemarie DeWitt, Lily Santiago, Wilson Bethel
description: In the vast expanse of Yosemite National Park, a woman's death draws a federal agent into lawless terrain — where nature obeys no rules but its own.

name: Gyeongseong Creature
genres: Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Mystery, Action & Adventure, Drama
actors: Park Seo-jun, Han So-hee
description: Gyeongseong, 1945. In Seoul's grim era under colonial rule, an entrepreneur and a sleuth fight for survival and face a monster born out of human greed.

name: Strange Tales from a Chinese Studio
actors: Zhang Liling, Yuyan Wang, Zheng Shuang, Zhou Yemang, Lü Liang

name: Dark Desire
description: Married Alma spends a fateful weekend away from home that ignites passion, ends in tragedy and leads her to question the truth about those close to her.

name: The Untamed
actors: Xiao Zhan, Wang Yibo, Wang Zhuocheng, Xuan Lu, Meng Ziyi
description: In a magical world of inter-clan rivalry, two soulmates face treacherous schemes and uncover a dark mystery linked to a tragic event in the past.

name: Beyblade: Metal Saga
genres: Animation, Mystery, Action & Adventure, Kids, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
actors: Nobuhiko Okamoto, Koki Uchiyama, Takuma Terashima, Yuuki Kodaira, Sumire Morohoshi
description: A new cast of characters take on the continued battle between good and evil. Gingka, our hero, and his group of loyal friends take on a dangerous group called the Dark Nebula. Dark Nebula’s mission is to take over the world and unleash their evil upon it; but before they can do so, they must destroy Gingka as he is the only person that’s strong enough to stand in their way. The plot thickens as friends become enemies and enemies become allies. Everything starts and ends with Gingka as he struggles to find the strength to defend his world and the honor of Beyblade.

name: Motive
actors: Kristin Lehman, Louis Ferreira, Brendan Penny, Lauren Holly
description: A team of Vancouver investigators, led by homicide detective Angie Flynn, sets out to uncover the motive of each puzzling murder by discovering the killer's connection to the victim. Viewers get a glimpse of the killer before and after the crime is committed.

name: Devious Maids
actors: Ana Ortiz, Dania Ramirez, Roselyn Sánchez, Judy Reyes, Rebecca Wisocky
description: The series centers on four Latina maids working in the homes of Beverly Hills’ wealthiest and most powerful families, and a newcomer who made it personal after a maid was murdered and determined to uncover the truth behind her demise, and in the process become an ally in their lives.

name: Streets of Broken Lights
actors: Aleksandr Polovtsev, Oleg Andreev, Mikhail Luchko, Aleksandr Nesterov, Elena Kuprashevich
description: Russian detectives unwind the ball of the most intricate and cruel crimes. They are consummate professionals, the best cops in town. Even on the most dangerous missions, this quartet never loses their sense of humor. It is it that helps them find the most incredible ways out of any situation. They uphold the law and emerge victorious.

name: The Institute
actors: Ben Barnes, Joe Freeman, Simone Miller, Fionn Laird, Hannah Galway
description: When 14 year old genius Luke Ellis is kidnapped, he awakens at The Institute, a facility full of children who all got there the same way he did, and who are all possessed of unusual abilities. In a nearby town, haunted former police officer Tim Jamieson has come looking to start a new life, but the peace and quiet won’t last, as his story and Luke’s are destined to collide.

name: Fortitude
actors: Richard Dormer, Sienna Guillory, Mia Jexen, Sofie Gråbøl, Luke Treadaway
description: Fortitude is a place like nowhere else. Although surrounded by the savage beauty of the Arctic landscape, Fortitude is one of the safest towns on earth. There has never been a violent crime here. Until now. In such a close-knit community a murder touches everyone and the unsettling, mysterious horror of this crime threatens the future of the town itself.

name: Revenge of Others
actors: Shin Ye-eun, Lomon, Seo Ji-hoon, Chae Sang-woo, Lee Soo-min
description: A boy falls to his death at school, but Ok Chan-mi does not believe that her twin brother, Park Won-seok, committed suicide. Chan-mi transfers to her brother's school, Yongtan High, and meets Ji Soo-heon, who witnessed her brother's death. A "hero," who avenges bullied students, appears at Yongtan High. Chan-mi speculates that it may be connected to her brother and starts looking for this hero.

name: Young Justice Bao
actors: Ashton Chen, Deng Chao, Zhao Yang, Qin Li, Yang Rong

name: Suspended Cop
actors: Denis Rozhkov, Anastasiya Tyunina, Aleksei Nilov, Sergey Koshonin, Aleksey Fokin

name: Sister Boniface Mysteries
actors: Lorna Watson, Max Brown, Jerry Iwu, Ami Metcalf
description: First there was Father Brown. Now, say hello to Sister Boniface. This clever, moped-riding nun is the police's secret weapon for solving murders in this divine Father Brown spin-off.

name: Perry Mason
actors: Matthew Rhys, Juliet Rylance, Chris Chalk, Justin Kirk, Diarra Kilpatrick
description: Set in 1932 Los Angeles, the series focuses on the origin story of famed defense lawyer Perry Mason. Living check-to-check as a low-rent private investigator, Mason is haunted by his wartime experiences in France and suffering the effects of a broken marriage. L.A. is booming while the rest of the country recovers from the Great Depression — but a kidnapping gone very wrong leads to Mason exposing a fractured city as he uncovers the truth of the crime.

name: The Night Of
actors: Riz Ahmed, John Turturro, Bill Camp, Payman Maadi, Jeannie Berlin
description: After a night of partying with a female stranger, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

name: When the Phone Rings
actors: Yoo Yeon-seok, Chae Soo-bin, Heo Nam-jun, Jang Gyu-ri
description: A rising politician and his mute wife's tense marriage begins to unravel after a call from a kidnapper turns their lives upside down.

name: Digimon Ghost Game
genres: Animation, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure, Mystery
actors: Mutsumi Tamura, Miyuki Sawashiro, Yu Kobayashi, Kazuya Nakai, Akira Ishida
description: High school freshman Hiro Amanokawa activates a mysterious device left behind by his father called "Digivice" that makes unknown creatures that cannot be seen by ordinary people, the Digimon, visible to his eyes. This is the story of this other side of the world that nobody is aware of. With their friends, Hiro and Gammamon dive into the mysterious world where these creatures live.

name: Close to Home
actors: Jennifer Finnigan, Kimberly Elise, Cress Williams, Jon Seda, David James Elliott
description: Close to Home is an American crime drama television series co-produced by Warner Bros. Television and Jerry Bruckheimer Television for CBS.

name: The Institute
actors: Ben Barnes, Joe Freeman, Simone Miller, Fionn Laird, Hannah Galway
description: When 14 year old genius Luke Ellis is kidnapped, he awakens at The Institute, a facility full of children who all got there the same way he did, and who are all possessed of unusual abilities. In a nearby town, haunted former police officer Tim Jamieson has come looking to start a new life, but the peace and quiet won’t last, as his story and Luke’s are destined to collide.

name: Jericho
director: Jon Turteltaub, Stephen Chbosky, Jonathan E. Steinberg
actors: Skeet Ulrich, Lennie James, Ashley Scott, Kenneth Mitchell, Brad Beyer
description: Jericho is an American action/drama series that centers on the residents of the fictional town of Jericho, Kansas, in the aftermath of nuclear attacks on 23 major cities in the contiguous United States.

name: Digimon Ghost Game
genres: Animation, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure, Mystery
actors: Mutsumi Tamura, Miyuki Sawashiro, Yu Kobayashi, Kazuya Nakai, Akira Ishida
description: High school freshman Hiro Amanokawa activates a mysterious device left behind by his father called "Digivice" that makes unknown creatures that cannot be seen by ordinary people, the Digimon, visible to his eyes. This is the story of this other side of the world that nobody is aware of. With their friends, Hiro and Gammamon dive into the mysterious world where these creatures live.

name: Vagabond
actors: Lee Seung-gi, Suzy, Shin Sung-rok, Moon Jeong-hee, Baek Yoon-sik
description: Stuntman Cha Dal-geon gets involved in a tragic airplane crash and ends up discovering a national corruption scandal in the process. Go Hae-ri, the oldest daughter of a deceased marine, decides to work for the National Intelligence Service as a secret ops agent in order to support her mom and younger siblings, although all she wanted to do is to become a civil servant.

name: GNOSIA
actors: Chika Anzai, Ikumi Hasegawa, Akari Kito, Hiroki Nanami, Asami Seto
description: When a shapeshifting enemy known as Gnosia infiltrates a lone spaceship, the crew has only one way to survive: identify the imposter each day and put them into cryo-sleep. But for Yuri, the day never ends. Trapped in a time loop, she relives the first day of the crisis over and over. To escape, Yuri must uncover the truth behind Gnosia and the time loop itself—before it’s too late.

name: Touch
actors: Kiefer Sutherland, David Mazouz, Saxon Sharbino, Lukas Haas
description: Martin Bohm, a widower and single father, is haunted by an inability to connect to his autistic, mute 11-year-old son, Jake. Their relationship and their lives take an extraordinary turn when he discovers his gifted son has the ability to see things that no one else can and the patterns that connect seemingly unrelated events.

name: Ultimate Note
actors: Joseph Zeng, Xiao Yuliang, Hani Kyzy, Liu Yuning, Fan Ming
description: The story focuses on Wu Xie who was born in a family of tomb explorers trying to find the secrets of a mysterious event decades ago with his friends.

name: Friday the 13th: The Series
director: Frank Mancuso Jr., Larry B. Williams
actors: Louise Robey, Chris Wiggins, John D. LeMay
description: Micki and Ryan with the help of their friend Jack try to recover cursed antiques so they can store them in safety inside the antique store's vault.

name: Three-Body
actors: Zhang Luyi, Yu Hewei, Chen Jin, Wang Ziwen, Lin Yongjian
description: Nanotechnology researcher Wang Miao is taken to the Joint Operations Center by police officer Shi Qiang, who's investigating the mysterious suicide wave among scientists worldwide,  and recruited to sneak into an organization called the Frontiers of Science to help the investigation. When Wang Miao is contacted by the leader of the organization, Shen Yufei, she introduces him to a sophisticated VR video game called Three-Body, but soon he discovers that it's more than just a game.

name: Long Bright River
actors: Amanda Seyfried, Nicholas Pinnock, Ashleigh Cummings, Callum Vinson, John Doman
description: A police officer patrols a Philadelphia neighborhood hard-hit by the opioid crisis. When a series of murders begins in the neighborhood, Mickey realizes that her personal history might be related to the case.

name: My Friends Tigger & Pooh
genres: Kids, Animation, Drama, Mystery, Action & Adventure
actors: Chloë Grace Moretz, Dee Bradley Baker, Jim Cummings, Travis Oates, Peter Cullen
description: Pooh, Tigger, and friends from the Hundred Acre Wood welcome new neighbors — an adorable six-year-old girl named Darby and her puppy, Buster. With the help of adventurous super sleuths Tigger and Pooh, every episode revolves around the solving of a mystery and an interactive curriculum that encourages viewers to help them out.

name: The Future Diary
actors: Misuzu Togashi, Tomosa Murata, Minoru Shiraishi, Akira Ishida, Masahiko Tanaka
description: Reality quickly unravels when antisocial Yukiteru is called into a death match against 11 other mentally scarred individuals. Each player has a prophetic device tuned to their personality, giving them control over their future—and the fate of their foes.

name: True Haunting
description: Paranormal encounters from the viewpoint of those who lived them are detailed through immersive reenactments and present-day interviews.

name: Umineko: When They Cry
genres: Animation, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Drama, Mystery, Crime
actors: Marina Inoue, Daisuke Ono, Emi Shinohara, Akihiko Ishizumi, Kenichi Suzumura
description:
As customary per year, the entire family is gathering on the island for a conference that discusses the current financial situations of each respective person. Because of the family head's poor health, this year involves the topic of the head of the family's inheritance and how it will be distributed.

However, the family is unaware that the distribution of his wealth is the least of Ushiromiya Kinzo's concerns for this year's family conference. After being told that his end was approaching by his longtime friend and physician, Kinzo is desperate to meet his life's true love one last time: the Golden Witch, Beatrice. Having immersed himself in black magic for many of the later years in his life, Kinzo instigates a ceremony to revive his beloved upon his family's arrival on Rokkenjima.

name: Revenge of Others
actors: Shin Ye-eun, Lomon, Seo Ji-hoon, Chae Sang-woo, Lee Soo-min
description: A boy falls to his death at school, but Ok Chan-mi does not believe that her twin brother, Park Won-seok, committed suicide. Chan-mi transfers to her brother's school, Yongtan High, and meets Ji Soo-heon, who witnessed her brother's death. A "hero," who avenges bullied students, appears at Yongtan High. Chan-mi speculates that it may be connected to her brother and starts looking for this hero.

name: Nancy Drew
actors: Kennedy McMann, Leah Lewis, Maddison Jaizani, Tunji Kasim, Alex Saxon
description: Nancy Drew makes plans to leave her hometown for college, but finds herself drawn into a supernatural murder mystery instead.

name: Shakespeare & Hathaway - Private Investigators
actors: Jo Joyner, Mark Benton, Patrick Walshe McBride
description: Frank Hathaway, a hardboiled private investigator, and his rookie sidekick Lu Shakespeare form the unlikeliest of partnerships as they investigate the secrets of rural Warwickshire's residents.

name: A Killer Paradox
actors: Choi Woo-shik, Son Suk-ku, Lee Hee-jun
description: When one accidental killing leads to another, an ordinary young man finds himself stuck in an endless cat-and-mouse chase with a shrewd detective.

name: Inspector Montalbano
actors: Luca Zingaretti, Peppino Mazzotta, Angelo Russo, Cesare Bocci, Marcello Perracchio
description: Inspector Montalbano is an Italian television series produced and broadcast by RAI since 1999, based on the detective novels of Andrea Camilleri. The protagonist is Commissario Salvo Montalbano, and the stories are set in the imaginary town of Vigata, Sicily. In 2012 the series generated a prequel, Il giovane Montalbano.

name: Dragnet
actors: Harry Morgan, Jack Webb
description: Police Detective Sgt. Joe Friday and his partners investigate crimes in Los Angeles.

name: One Call Bar
actors: Danila Kozlovsky
description: In the One Call bar, anyone can call a deceased loved one by agreeing to a deadly game of Russian roulette. Investigator Andrey Morozov is looking for his missing son, and all the evidence leads to a mysterious bar that appears in different places, leaving behind the bodies of dead visitors.

name: PLUTO
actors: Shinshu Fuji
description: When the world's seven most advanced robots and their human allies are murdered one by one, Inspector Gesicht soon discovers that he's also in danger.

name: Creepshow
description: A young boy's horror comic book comes to life in this anthology series of terrifying tales.

name: Immortality
actors: Arthur Chen, Luo Yunxi, Chen Yao, Zhou Qi, Tse Kwan-Ho
description: Mo Ran is the young disciple of the most powerful cultivator in the world, Chu Wan Ning. Due to misunderstandings and general differences, the two have been at odds with each other. Chu Wan Ning finds himself helpless in the face of Mo Ran's teenage rebellion and the two keep on drawing further apart. Unbeknownst to Chu Wan Ning, in a past life, Mo Ran and Chu Wan Ning's animosity ended in great bloodshed and misery when Mo Ran turned to the dark cultivating techniques. After the past life ends, sixteen-year-old Mo Ran wakes up with knowledge regarding the events of that past life. Believing he can change his tragic end this time around, Mo Ran sets out to change the course of events as he knows them but soon finds out things are not as they seemed to him.

name: Unsolved Mysteries
actors: Dennis Farina
description: Combines four to five segments of dramatic re-enactments, interviews and updates of real human and paranormal mysteries. An audience interactive call-to-action request allowed viewers to call in with tips to help solve the cases.

name: The Hunger
actors: David Bowie
description:
The Hunger is a British/Canadian television horror anthology series, co-produced by Scott Free Productions, Telescene Film Group Productions and the Canadian pay-TV channel The Movie Network. Though it shares a title with the feature film The Hunger the series has no direct plot or character connection to the film, and was created by Jeff Fazio.

Originally shown on the Sci Fi Channel in the UK, The Movie Network in Canada and Showtime in the US, the series was broadcast from 1997 to 2000, and is internally organized into two seasons. Each episode was based around an independent story introduced by the host; Terence Stamp hosted each episode for the first season, and was replaced in the second season by David Bowie. Stories tended to focus on themes of self-destructive desire and obsession, with a strong component of soft-core erotica; popular tropes for the stories included cannibalism, vampires, sex, and poison.

name: Detective Chinatown
actors: Roy Chiu, Shang Yuxian, Zhang Yishang, Kenny Bee, Yu Haoming
description: Strange crimes occur in Thailand as the ranking for the world's best detective sees a shift. New detectives come into the picture to tackle three difficult cases.

name: Cat's Eye
genres: Animation, Action & Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Crime
actors: Tamio Ohki, Yoshito Yasuhara, Keiko Toda, Chika Sakamoto, Toshiko Fujita
description: Cat's Eye is the most notorious group of art thieves in Japan. No one knows their identities, but for most of Tokyo, the mystery only heightens their allure.

name: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
actors: Alfred Hitchcock
description: A television anthology series hosted by Alfred Hitchcock featuring dramas, thrillers, and mysteries.

name: Mieruko-chan
actors: Sora Amamiya, Kaede Hondo, Ayane Sakura, Yuichi Nakamura, Ikuko Tani
description: She can see dead people…she just chooses to ignore them. That’s Miko’s plan, anyway, with horrifying (and sometimes hilarious) results.

name: The Girlfriend
actors: Robin Wright, Olivia Cooke, Laurie Davidson, Waleed Zuaiter, Tanya Moodie
description: Laura has it all: a glittering career, a loving husband, and her precious son, Daniel. But her perfect life unravels when Daniel brings home Cherry, a girlfriend who changes everything. After a tense introduction, Laura becomes convinced Cherry is hiding something. Is she a manipulative social climber, or is Laura just paranoid? The truth is a matter of perspective.

name: Burning for Revenge
actors: Adela Noriega, Eduardo Yáñez, Elizabeth Álvarez, Jorge Salinas, Nora Salinas
description:
Fuego en la sangre is a telenovela that began transmissions on January 21, 2008, through Mexico's Canal de las Estrellas network. Starring Adela Noriega, Eduardo Yáñez, Diana Bracho, and Guillermo García Cantú.

It is the Mexican remake of the Colombian soap operas Las Aguas Mansas and Pasion de Gavilanes. The theme song called "Para Siempre" is sung by Vicente Fernández.

The telenovela received TVyNovelas Award for Best Telenovela, in 2009.

name: M Squad
actors: Lee Marvin, Paul Newlan
description: Lt. Frank Ballinger is a no-nonsense plain clothes cop in the elite M Squad Division. The Squad's task is to root out organised crime and corruption in America's Second City, Chicago.

name: Tower of God
genres: Animation, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure
actors: Taichi Ichikawa, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Yuma Uchida, Sayumi Watabe, Yu Shimamura
description: Reach the top, and everything will be yours. At the top of the tower exists everything in this world, and all of it can be yours. You can become a god. This is the story of the beginning and the end of Rachel, the girl who climbed the tower so she could see the stars, and Bam, the boy who needed nothing but her.

name: Basta't Kasama Kita
actors: Robin Padilla, Judy Ann Santos, Rommel Padilla, Gina Pareño, Tetchie Agbayani
description:
Basta't Kasama Kita was an ABS-CBN primetime series starring Robin Padilla and Judy Ann Santos. The show also aired worldwide on ABS-CBN's The Filipino Channel and on a two-week delay on the International Channel in the United States.

The TV series re-aired on the defunct Pinoy Central TV in 2005-2006 and in 2010-2011 it re-aired on Kapamilya Channel, an affiliate of ABS-CBN's The Filipino Channel

name: Tell Me Your Name
director: Hugo Stuven Casasnovas, Alejandro Hernández, César de Nicolás
actors: Michelle Jenner, Darío Grandinetti, Younes Bouab, Elena Rivera, Raúl Arévalo
description: Toledo, Spain, 1997. The residents of Río Blanco have accepted the settlement of Moroccan seasonal workers in Fuensanta. Coexistence brings tensions, known by Sonia, an NGO leader; Father Ángel, the local priest; and Safir, the imam. What they don't imagine is that Fuensanta's foundations hide something capable of unleashing their worst nightmares, regardless of their beliefs or prayers.

name: Ron Kamonohashi's Forbidden Deductions
actors: Yohei Azakami, Junya Enoki, Yoko Hikasa, Taku Yashiro
description: Ron Kamonohashi was once regarded as a genius at the top detective training academy. But after a fatal mistake, he was expelled and forbidden to become a detective. Years later, police officer Totomaru Isshiki knocks on Ron’s door seeking help on a serial murder case. He finds Ron, now a messy-haired recluse, who agrees. Together, this mismatched detective team begins solving their first mystery!

name: Cat's Eye
actors: Mikako Komatsu, Ami Koshimizu, Yumiri Hanamori, Takuya Sato, Yoko Hikasa
description: By day, sisters Hitomi, Rui and Ai run the popular Cat's Eye Café; by night, they slip into the shadows, executing high-stakes art heists with precision and style.

name: Masterpiece Mystery
actors: Gene Shalit, Vincent Price, Diana Rigg, Alan Cumming
description: Mystery! is an episodic television series that debuted in 1980 in the USA. It airs on PBS and is produced by WGBH. The show has brought a large number of detective series and television movies—most of them British productions from the BBC or the ITV companies and usually adapted from mystery fiction literary sources—to air on American television. In 2002, they added an American-produced series based on the novels of Tony Hillerman to their roster.

name: Them
actors: Deborah Ayorinde, Pam Grier, Luke James, Joshua J. Williams, Jeremy Bobb
description: A limited anthology series that explores terror in America.

name: Tower of God
genres: Animation, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure
actors: Taichi Ichikawa, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Yuma Uchida, Sayumi Watabe, Yu Shimamura
description: Reach the top, and everything will be yours. At the top of the tower exists everything in this world, and all of it can be yours. You can become a god. This is the story of the beginning and the end of Rachel, the girl who climbed the tower so she could see the stars, and Bam, the boy who needed nothing but her.

name: Cat's Eye
genres: Animation, Action & Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Crime
actors: Tamio Ohki, Yoshito Yasuhara, Keiko Toda, Chika Sakamoto, Toshiko Fujita
description: Cat's Eye is the most notorious group of art thieves in Japan. No one knows their identities, but for most of Tokyo, the mystery only heightens their allure.

name: The Hunger
actors: David Bowie
description:
The Hunger is a British/Canadian television horror anthology series, co-produced by Scott Free Productions, Telescene Film Group Productions and the Canadian pay-TV channel The Movie Network. Though it shares a title with the feature film The Hunger the series has no direct plot or character connection to the film, and was created by Jeff Fazio.

Originally shown on the Sci Fi Channel in the UK, The Movie Network in Canada and Showtime in the US, the series was broadcast from 1997 to 2000, and is internally organized into two seasons. Each episode was based around an independent story introduced by the host; Terence Stamp hosted each episode for the first season, and was replaced in the second season by David Bowie. Stories tended to focus on themes of self-destructive desire and obsession, with a strong component of soft-core erotica; popular tropes for the stories included cannibalism, vampires, sex, and poison.

name: Love You as the World Ends
actors: Ryoma Takeuchi, Marie Iitoyo
description:
26-year-old car mechanic Hibiki Mamiya lives with his high school sweetheart of the same age, Kurumi Ogasawara. Life together feels so natural and filled with the warmth of each other's love. It was a happiness they expected would last a lifetime.

Hibiki is secretly preparing his proposal to Kurumi when misfortune strikes. A tunnel collapses, trapping him for four days. Barely making it out alive, he discovers a world completely changed. There is absolutely no one around, communication signals are dead, the transportation network is a wreck, and the only information available is the emergency evacuation order being repeated on the radio. Everywhere Hibiki goes, he sees bloodstains.

Just what happened to this town?!

name: Mobius
actors: Bai Jingting, Janice Man, Song Yang, Zhang Bojia, Cao Yangmingzhu
description: In Hua'ao City, a brilliant detective with a flawless track record faces his toughest case yet when a string of seemingly perfect murders shakes the city. With no evidence, no witnesses, and a killer who vanishes without a trace, he must race against time to uncover the truth. As hidden dangers lurk in every corner, the line between hunter and hunted begins to blur.

name: Unforgotten
actors: Sanjeev Bhaskar, Sinéad Keenan, Carolina Main, Jordan Long, MyAnna Buring
description: London police detectives Cassie Stuart and Sunny Khan investigate historic cold cases involving missing persons, murder and long-hidden secrets.

name: Mieruko-chan
actors: Sora Amamiya, Kaede Hondo, Ayane Sakura, Yuichi Nakamura, Ikuko Tani
description: She can see dead people…she just chooses to ignore them. That’s Miko’s plan, anyway, with horrifying (and sometimes hilarious) results.

name: The Mysteries of Laura
actors: Debra Messing, Josh Lucas, Laz Alonso, Janina Gavankar, Max Jenkins
description: Laura Diamond, a brilliant NYPD homicide detective balances her “Columbo” day job with a crazy family life that includes two unruly twin boys and a soon-to-be ex-husband — also a cop — who just can't seem to sign the divorce papers. Between cleaning up after her boys and cleaning up the streets, she’d be the first to admit she has her “hot mess” moments in this hilariously authentic look at what it really means to be a “working mom” today. Somehow, she makes it all work with the help of her sexy and understanding partner, and things becomes even more complicated when her husband, ironically, becomes her boss at the precinct. For Laura, every day is a high-wire balancing act.

name: The Hunting Wives
actors: Brittany Snow, Malin Åkerman, Jaime Ray Newman, Katie Lowes, Chrissy Metz
description: Sophie trades New England for East Texas and falls into a wealthy socialite's magnetic orbit — where a clique of housewives hide deadly secrets.

name: Locke & Key
director: Meredith Averill, Aron Eli Coleite, Carlton Cuse
actors: Darby Stanchfield, Emilia Jones, Jackson Robert Scott, Connor Jessup, Petrice Jones
description: After their dad's murder, three siblings move with their mom to his ancestral estate, where they discover magical keys that unlock powers — and secrets.

name: The Haunted House
genres: Animation, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure
actors: Cho Hyun-jung, Kim Young-eun, Kim Chae-ha
description: With help from a 102-year-old goblin dwelling beneath their haunted apartment building, two siblings deal with ghosts and take on spooky mysteries.

name: Naagin
actors: Tejasswi Prakash, Simba Nagpal, Maheck Chahal, Sudha Chandran, Urvashi Dholakia
description: A miraculous shape-shifting snake has the power to become a human. She can be anybody she wants: a wife, a seductress, a mistress, a damsel in distress: all in the name of revenge.

name: S Line
actors: Lee Soo-hyuk, Choi Ye-won, Lee Da-hee, Lee Eun-saem, Lee Kwang-hee
description: A young woman with the ability to see mysterious red connections between lovers discovers her secret gift is no longer unique when special glasses granting similar powers appear on the black market.

name: The Fall of the House of Usher
actors: Carla Gugino, Bruce Greenwood, Mary McDonnell, Henry Thomas, Kate Siegel
description: Ruthless siblings Roderick and Madeline Usher have built Fortunato Pharmaceuticals into an empire of wealth, privilege and power. But past secrets come to light when the heirs to the Usher dynasty start dying at the hands of a mysterious woman from their youth.

name: Creepshow
description: A young boy's horror comic book comes to life in this anthology series of terrifying tales.

name: Absolute Zero
actors: Yasuko Sawaguchi
description: Izumi Sakuragi is a new police sergeant with the Special Investigations Office, which was set up within the Metropolitan Police in November last year. The new investigation team uses DNA analysis and the latest in forensics science to investigate cold cases as well as cases suspected to involve missing persons.

name: Masters of Horror
description: An anthology series written and directed by the most famous names in horror.

name: Revival
actors: Melanie Scrofano, Romy Weltman, David James Elliott, Andy McQueen
description: On one miraculous day in rural Wisconsin, the recently deceased suddenly rise from their graves. But this is no zombie story, as the 'revived' appear and act just like they once were. When local officer and single mother Dana Cypress is unexpectedly thrown into the center of a brutal murder mystery of her own, she's left to make sense of the chaos amidst a town gripped by fear and confusion where everyone, alive or undead, is a suspect.

name: Mysterious Joker
description: The thief Mysterious Joker doesn't just steal things. An audacious and elusive miracle-maker, he travels the world searching for treasure with his partner and cook Hachi. As they circle the globe, they must avoid traps set by the police and compete in various competitions to reach their final goal, the Timeslip Treasure.

name: Locke & Key
director: Meredith Averill, Aron Eli Coleite, Carlton Cuse
actors: Darby Stanchfield, Emilia Jones, Jackson Robert Scott, Connor Jessup, Petrice Jones
description: After their dad's murder, three siblings move with their mom to his ancestral estate, where they discover magical keys that unlock powers — and secrets.

name: Guardians of the Dafeng
actors: Dylan Wang, Tian Xiwei, Liu Yijun, Yan Zidong, Yue Yang
description: Xu Qi’an, a recent police academy graduate, awakens in a strange world filled with Confucians, Taoists, Buddhists, demons, and warlocks. Facing imminent exile to a remote frontier town, he seizes the chance to change his fate by joining a powerful organization of guardians.

name: Friendly Rivalry
actors: Lee Hye-ri, Chung Su-bin, Kang Hye-won, Oh Woo-ri, Kim Tae-hun
description: A high-teen mystery thriller about a close relationship between teenage girls in a harsher survival competition than entrance examinations.

name: Wonder Egg Priority
actors: Tomori Kusunoki, Kanata Aikawa, Shuka Saito, Hinaki Yano, Yuuya Uchida
description: Ai, a young girl with shut-in tendencies, who tries not to interact with others. She keeps one of her eyes hidden behind her hair. One day, she happens to stop by a deserted arcade, where she meets "Aka." Spinning the gacha at their urging, she acquires a "Wonder Egg," and from that moment, her fate begins to change...

name: Princess Principal
actors: Akira Sekine, Ayaka Imamura, Nozomi Furuki, You Taichi, Akari Kageyama
description: The stage is set during the 19th century London, in its capital where a wall divides the east and west of the Kingdom of Albion. Five high school girls, who enrolled in the prestigious Queens May Fair School, are involved in spy activities that involve disguise, infiltration, car chase, and more. These girls take advantage of their special abilities and fly around the shadow world.

name: Darker
actors: Guo Jingfei, Li Qian, Candice Zhao, Shawn Wei, Jeam
description: A series of serial killings is exposed and creates a stir among the public. A killer called "Darker" has been leaving a death notification card after killing scumbags who evaded the law.  To counter the provocation of the mysterious killer, the police creates a special investigation team.

name: Ⅵ Group of Fatal Case
actors: Li Chengru, Wang Qian, Zhang Chao, Dong Yong, Ding Zhicheng
description: Six very different but equally determined and dedicated police officers comprise a group specializing in serious criminal cases involving homicide, mafia activity, terrorism, drug trafficking, extortion, kidnapping, and robbery.

name: The Sandhamn Murders
actors: Alexandra Rapaport
description: Viveca Stens popular novels come to life in "The Sandhamn Murders", a perfect mix of Nordic crime & the beautiful surroundings of the outer Stockholm archipelago.

name: Candle in the Tomb: The Worm Valley
actors: Pan Yueming, Zhang Yuqi, Jiang Chao, Tong Lei, Wang Kuirong
description: Hu Bayi, Shirley Yang and Fatty Wang discover that the rumoured life-saving "dust bead" had become a burial object in the tomb of the King Xian of the ancient Dian Kingdom and set to find the traces of the mystic object. Following a human skin map, the three pass through the secret underground waterway of the ancient Dian Kingdom under the Zhalong Mountain.

name: Spenser: For Hire
actors: Robert Urich, Avery Brooks, Barbara Stock, Ron McLarty
description: Mystery and suspense series based on Robert Parker's "Spenser" novels. Spenser, a private investigator living in Boston, gets involved in a new murder mystery each episode.

name: The Legend of Chusen
genres: Action & Adventure, Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
actors: Li Yifeng, Zhao Liying, Yang Zi, Tang Yixin, Ding Yi
description: Can a man love a woman but still take down her father? Zhang Xiao Fan and his childhood friend Lin Jing Yu were the only survivors of the Grass Village massacre that wiped out both of their families. Taken in by the Qing Yun Sect, the boys were trained in the ways of the Immortal Sword. Xiao Fan falls in love with Bi Yao, the daughter of the Ghost King. But when the Ghost King tries to grow his power by overthrowing the Qing Yun Sect, Xiao Fan must choose between protecting his people and hurting the woman he loves.

name: Truth Be Told
actors: Octavia Spencer, Mekhi Phifer, David Lyons, Gabrielle Union, Ron Cephas Jones
description: Descend into the world of true-crime podcasts with Poppy Parnell, who risks everything—including her life—to pursue truth and justice.

name: Revival
actors: Melanie Scrofano, Romy Weltman, David James Elliott, Andy McQueen
description: On one miraculous day in rural Wisconsin, the recently deceased suddenly rise from their graves. But this is no zombie story, as the 'revived' appear and act just like they once were. When local officer and single mother Dana Cypress is unexpectedly thrown into the center of a brutal murder mystery of her own, she's left to make sense of the chaos amidst a town gripped by fear and confusion where everyone, alive or undead, is a suspect.

name: Light Shop
actors: Ju Ji-hoon, Park Bo-young, Um Tae-goo, Kim Seol-hyun, Lee Jung-eun
description: In a mysterious shop that sells lamps, the dead may return to the world of the living, while the living may not walk out alive.

name: The OA
actors: Brit Marling, Jason Isaacs, Emory Cohen, Kingsley Ben-Adir, Phyllis Smith
description: Seven years after vanishing from her home, a young woman returns with mysterious new abilities and recruits five strangers for a secret mission.

name: Bitch X Rich
actors: Lee Eun-saem, YERI, Lee Jong-hyuk, Park Si-woo, Jang Sung-yoon
description: Kim Hye-in has to transfer to Cheongdam International High School after witnessing a murder. She crosses paths with Baek Je-na, a bully who happens to be connected to the case.

name: A Korean Odyssey
director: Hong Jeong-eun, Hong Mi-ran, Kim Byeong-su
actors: Lee Seung-gi, Cha Seung-won, Oh Yeon-seo, Lee Hong-gi, Jang Kwang
description: A self-serving mythical creature's bid for invincibility backfires when he finds himself at the mercy of a woman who can see otherworldly beings.

name: The Alienist
actors: Daniel Brühl, Luke Evans, Dakota Fanning, Matthew Shear, Douglas Smith
description: New York, 1896. Police commissioner Theodore Roosevelt brings together criminal psychologist Dr. Laszlo Kreizler, newspaper illustrator John Moore and secretary Sara Howard to investigate several murders of male prostitutes.

name: Shiki
actors: Nobuhiko Okamoto, Wataru Takagi, Gackt, Haruka Tomatsu, Kazuyuki Okitsu
description: Sotobamura is a small village with around 1300 residents; so small the village isn't even connected to a single highway. An isolated village in which old customs, such as the burial of the dead, are still practiced. One day, the bodies of three people are found dead. Although Ozaki Toshio, the village's lone doctor, feels uncertain, he treats the deaths as a normal occurrence. However, in the days following, the villagers start to die one after the other.

name: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
actors: Frank Welker, Matthew Lillard, Grey DeLisle, Kate Micucci
description: The Mystery Inc. gang solve bigger mysteries while also encountering many memorable celebrities.

name: Justice in the Dark
actors: Zhang Xincheng, Fu Xinbo, Zhao Zhiwei, Liu Yihong, Xiao Yu
description: In the year 253 of the Neo-Civilization, Captain Luo Weizhao and Pei Su investigates a series of crimes tied to the controversial "Apaths," uncovering a deeper conspiracy that challenges society's beliefs about morality, free will, and the power of hope.

name: The Night Of
actors: Riz Ahmed, John Turturro, Bill Camp, Payman Maadi, Jeannie Berlin
description: After a night of partying with a female stranger, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

name: Hellbound
actors: Kim Sung-cheol, Kim Hyun-joo, Kim Shin-rock
description:
Unearthly beings deliver bloody condemnations, sending individuals to hell and giving rise to a religious group founded on the idea of divine justice.

~~ Adapted from the webcomic "Hellbound" (지옥) written by Yeon Sang Ho (연상호) and illustrated by Choi Kyu Seok (최규석).

name: The Supernatural Sweet Shop
actors: Toshiki Kumagai, Fukujuro Katayama, Nobue Iketani, Tamaki Shiratori
description: Zenitendo is a mysterious candy store that only lucky people can reach. All the candy recommended by Beniko, the owner of the store, is perfectly suited to the buyer's troubles. However, it depends on whether the candy will be used or eaten correctly that it can bring happiness or misfortune.

name: Fatal Seduction
actors: Kgomotso Christopher, Nathaniel Ramabulana, Prince Grootboom, Thapelo Mokoena, Ngele Ramulondi
description: A married professor is pulled into a passionate affair with a younger man that uncovers a path of tragedy and betrayal from those closest to her.

name: Revamp: The Undead Story
actors: Noppanut Guntachai, Warut Chawalitrujiwong, Jiruntanin Trairattanayon, Tinnasit Isarapongporn, Napat Patcharachavalit
description: After his blood frees a century-old vampire trapped in a painting, an antique dealer must help him regain his powers before deadly Hunters close in.

name: Love You as the World Ends
actors: Ryoma Takeuchi, Marie Iitoyo
description:
26-year-old car mechanic Hibiki Mamiya lives with his high school sweetheart of the same age, Kurumi Ogasawara. Life together feels so natural and filled with the warmth of each other's love. It was a happiness they expected would last a lifetime.

Hibiki is secretly preparing his proposal to Kurumi when misfortune strikes. A tunnel collapses, trapping him for four days. Barely making it out alive, he discovers a world completely changed. There is absolutely no one around, communication signals are dead, the transportation network is a wreck, and the only information available is the emergency evacuation order being repeated on the radio. Everywhere Hibiki goes, he sees bloodstains.

Just what happened to this town?!

name: Spy Classroom
actors: Sora Amamiya, Miku Ito, Nao Toyama, Aoi Yuuki, Sumire Uesaka
description: Spy-in-training Lily is desperate to score a passing grade. Eager to prove herself, she leaps at the chance to join the mysterious team Lamplight and beat the Impossible Mission. Too bad the task ahead is even more harrowing than she imagined…

name: Celebrity
actors: Park Gyu-young, Kang Min-hyuk, Lee Chung-ah, Lee Dong-gun, Jun Hyo-seong
description: Fame. Money. Power. One young woman fights to become the next hottest celebrity in the glamorous yet scandalous world of influencers in Seoul.

name: God Friended Me
actors: Brandon Micheal Hall, Violett Beane, Suraj Sharma, Javicia Leslie, Joe Morton
description: A self-proclaimed "pesky atheist" is encouraged to help strangers by someone claiming to be God who friends him on Facebook.

name: Casi Ángeles
genres: Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Soap
actors: Nicolás Vázquez, Emilia Attías, Alejo Garcia Pintos, Lali Espósito, Peter Lanzani
description: A group of kids is abused and exploited, but everything changes with Cielo and Nico. A story full of music, songs, choreography and competitions.

name: The Purge
actors: Paola Nuñez, Max Martini, Derek Luke, Joel Allen, Lindsey Pearlman
description: Set in a dystopian America ruled by a totalitarian political party, the series follows several seemingly unrelated characters living in a small city. Tying them all together is a mysterious savior who’s impeccably equipped for everything the night throws at them. As the clock winds down with their fates hanging in the balance, each character is forced to reckon with their pasts as they discover how far they will go to survive the night.

name: Detective Club
actors: He Jiong, Zhang Ruoyun, Wowkie Zhang

name: The File Of Justice
actors: Amy Chan, Sammi Cheng, Bobby Au-Yeung Tsan-Wah, Michael Tao Tai-Yu, Wilson Ai Wai
description: The Files of Justice is a series of Hong Kong legal drama produced by TVB. There were 5 seasons produced, the first was aired in 1992 spanning 13 episodes. The series revolves around a group of lawyers and legal personnel with stories interwoven between their personal lives and the court cases in which they’re engaged. This drama is Bobby Au Yeung's TV debut.

name: Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion
actors: Yume Miyamoto, Yuuichirou Umehara, Shuichiro Umeda, Shunichi Toki, Akira Ishida
description: Living inside a fairy tale may sound like a dream, but for this heroine, it’s more of a nightmare. After her mysterious death, Rinko is reborn as Raeliana—a loved and wealthy character in a novel. But she knows the ending: her murder at the hands of her fiancé. So, she hatches a plan to stay alive, one that involves a devilish duke and a phony engagement. Can she rewrite her story?

name: Flower of Evil
actors: Lee Joon-gi, Moon Chae-won, Jang Hee-jin, Seo Hyun-woo, Jung Seo-yeon
description: Hiding a twisted past, a man maintains his facade as the perfect husband to his detective wife — until she begins investigating a series of murders.

name: The Ruth Rendell Mysteries
actors: George Baker, Christopher Ravenscroft, Louie Ramsay, Diane Keen
description: The Ruth Rendell mysteries is a British television series made by TVS and Meridian Television for ITV between 2 August 1987 and 11 October 2000.

name: Dirty Linen
actors: Janine Gutierrez, Zanjoe Marudo, Francine Diaz, Seth Fedelin, John Arcilla
description: To exact vengeance, a young woman infiltrates the household of an influential family as a housemaid to expose their dirty secrets. However, love will get in the way of her revenge plot.

name: The Haunted House
genres: Animation, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Action & Adventure
actors: Cho Hyun-jung, Kim Young-eun, Kim Chae-ha
description: With help from a 102-year-old goblin dwelling beneath their haunted apartment building, two siblings deal with ghosts and take on spooky mysteries.

name: Trick
actors: Yukie Nakama, Hiroshi Abe, Katsuhisa Namase, Yoko Nogiwa, Masumi Okada
description: Although 23 year old Yamada Naoko is a "super" magician, she is continously fired and constantly hounded by her landlady for the rent being late. After being fired once again, her boss shows her an ad of a physics professor, a non-believer of all things magical, offering money to anyone who can prove to him that magic is real. Desperately needing the money, Naoko accepts the challenge, which is how she comes to meet Professor Ueda. Falling prey to her simple magic tricks, Ueda is impressed, and enlists Naoko to help him uncover the tricks behind a local cult. Their hilarious antics, along with those of police officer Yabe, leads them onto further mysteries, all with tricks needing to be solved in sort of an "X-Files" meets "Scooby-Doo"...

name: Layton Mystery Detective Agency: Kat's Mystery‑Solving Files
actors: Kana Hanazawa, Koichi Yamadera, Kyousuke Ikeda, Hibiku Yamamura, Jurota Kosugi
description: The story is set in London and follows Katrielle as she solves mysteries with her talking dog Sherl.

name: KamiKatsu: Working for God in a Godless World
actors: Junya Enoki, Akari Kito, Kana Hanazawa, Sumire Uesaka, Sho Fujisawa
description: Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world! It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...! A unique "reincarnating in other world" adventure begins: creating a "religion" in a world without God?!

name: Galileo
director: Hiroshi Nishitani, Takashi Narita, Kensaku Sawada
actors: Masaharu Fukuyama, Yuriko Yoshitaka, Kazuki Kitamura, Yu Sawabe, Ikkei Watanabe
description: Narrates the events and cases encountered by Kaoru Utsumi, a rookie detective, and Manabu Yukawa, a university associate professor, while the two pair up to solve many mysterious cases.

name: Busted!
actors: Yoo Jae-suk, Park Min-young, Sehun, Kim Se-jeong, Lee Kwang-soo
description: Suspense, surprises and fun abound in this Korean variety game show featuring big personalities and even bigger mysteries in every episode.

name: Elfen Lied
genres: Action & Adventure, Animation, Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
actors: Chihiro Suzuki, Sanae Kobayashi, Emiko Hagiwara, Hiroaki Hirata, Hitomi Nabatame
